test-set.name: prod-OrExpr
test-set.description: Tests for the OrExpr and AndExpr productions

source.description: Data for the the XML Query XMP use cases

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not("" or 0)`.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(0 or 0)`.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(0 or 0)`.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not("" or 0)`.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `1 or 1`.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `1 or 0`.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `1 or 5`.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-8
test-case.description: Non-empty xs:anyURIs in the left branch of an or-expression has an EBV value of true.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-9
test-case.description: Non-empty xs:anyURIs in the right branch of an or-expression has an EBV value of true.

test-case.description: Non-empty xs:anyURIs in the left branch of an or-expression has an EBV value of true.

test-case.description: Non-empty xs:anyURIs in the right branch of an or-expression has an EBV value of true.

test-case.description: Non-empty xs:untypedAtomics in the left branch of an or-expression has an EBV value of true.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-13
test-case.description: Non-empty xs:untypedAtomics in the right branch of an or-expression has an EBV value of true.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-14
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `true() or (0, current-time())[1] treat as xs:integer`.
test-case.test: true() or (0, current-time())[1] treat as xs:integer

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-15
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(0, current-time())[1] treat as xs:integer or true()`.
test-case.test: (0, current-time())[1] treat as xs:integer or true()

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-16
test-case.description: An 'or' expression having an operand which EBV cannot be extracted from.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-17
test-case.description: An 'or' expression having an operand which EBV cannot be extracted from.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-18
test-case.description: An 'or' expression whose operands EBV cannot be extracted from.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-19
test-case.description: An 'and' expression having an operand which EBV cannot be extracted from.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-20
test-case.description: An 'and' expression having an operand which EBV cannot be extracted from.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-21
test-case.description: An 'and' expression whose operands EBV cannot be extracted from.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-25
test-case.test: boolean((1, 2, 3, current-time())[1] treat as xs:integer) or boolean((1, 2, 3, current-time())[1] treat as xs:integer)

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-26
test-case.test: boolean((1, 2, 3, current-time())[1] treat as xs:integer) and true()

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-27
test-case.test: true() or boolean((1, 2, 3, current-time())[1] treat as xs:integer)

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-28
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not("" and 0)`.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `1 and 1`.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-30
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `10.3 and "non-zero length string"`.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-31
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `1 and 5`.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-32
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not((1, current-time())[1] treat as xs:integer and false())`.
test-case.test: not((1, current-time())[1] treat as xs:integer and false())

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-33
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(false() and (1, current-time())[1] treat as xs:integer)`.
test-case.test: not(false() and (1, current-time())[1] treat as xs:integer)

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-34
test-case.description: Non-empty xs:anyURIs have an EBV value of true.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-35
test-case.description: Empty xs:anyURIs have an EBV value of false.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-36
test-case.description: Empty xs:anyURIs have an EBV value of false.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-37
test-case.description: Non-empty xs:untypedAtomics have an EBV value of true.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-38
test-case.description: Empty xs:untypedAtomics have an EBV value of false.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-42
test-case.test: boolean((1, 2, 3, current-time())[1] treat as xs:integer) and boolean((1, 2, 3, current-time())[1] treat as xs:integer)

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-43
test-case.test: boolean((1, 2, 3, current-time())[1] treat as xs:integer) and true()

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-44
test-case.test: true() and boolean((1, 2, 3, current-time())[1] treat as xs:integer)

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-45
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `"a string is ok" and QName("", "local")`.

test-case.name: K-LogicExpr-46
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `"a string is ok" or QName("", "local")`.

test-case.name: cbcl-logical-and-002
test-case.test: declare function local:times-table($n as xs:integer) as xs:integer* { for $x in 1 to 12 return $x * $n }; (every $x in local:times-table(15) satisfies ($x mod 3 eq 0)) and (every $y in local:times-table(15) satisfies ($y mod 5 eq 0))

test-case.name: cbcl-logical-and-003
test-case.test: declare function local:factorial($n as xs:integer) as xs:integer { if ($n le 1) then 1 else $n * local:factorial($n - 1) }; declare function local:is-divisible($n as xs:integer, $d as xs:integer) { $n mod $d eq 0 }; not(local:is-divisible(local:factorial(5), 3)) and not(local:is-divisible(local:factorial(5), 2))

test-case.name: cbcl-logical-or-001
test-case.test: declare function local:times-table($n as xs:integer) as xs:integer* { for $x in 1 to 12 return $x * $n }; (some $x in local:times-table(15) satisfies ($x mod 2 eq 0)) or (some $y in local:times-table(15) satisfies ($y mod 3 eq 0))

test-case.name: cbcl-logical-or-002
test-case.test: declare function local:factorial($n as xs:integer) as xs:integer? { if ($n lt 1) then () else if ($n eq 1) then 1 else $n * local:factorial($n - 1) }; (every $x in local:factorial(5) satisfies ($x mod 3 eq 0)) or (every $y in local:factorial(5) satisfies ($y mod 5 eq 0))

test-case.name: cbcl-logical-or-003
test-case.test: declare function local:factorial($n as xs:integer) as xs:integer { if ($n le 1) then 1 else $n * local:factorial($n - 1) }; declare function local:is-divisible($n as xs:integer, $d as xs:integer) { $n mod $d eq 0 }; not(local:is-divisible(local:factorial(5), 3)) or not(local:is-divisible(local:factorial(5), 2))
